subject: Re: [junit] OT: Apparently all my messages are spam
msgSnippet: ... *cough* Some of us _had_ been wondering how to break this to you. *cough* There goes my invitation to his mansion in the Grand Caymans! :-) Simon --
messageBody:
On 8/10/06, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
> Everyone:
>
> I apologize for the sudden flood of some old responses of mine. For some
> reason, Yahoo! groups' SpamGuard assumes that many messages coming from
> me are spam.

*cough* Some of us _had_ been wondering how to break this to you. *cough*

There goes my invitation to his mansion in the Grand Caymans! :-)

Simon

--
www.simonpeter.org
